news.title: Irish citizens in Doha advised to ‘shelter in place’ as Israel attempts to assassinate Hamas officials with airstrikes in Qatar
Bob Geldof rules himself out of presidency race as Fianna Fáil chooses Jim Gavin for Áras run
news.summary: Fianna Fáil has voted for former All-Ireland-winning Dublin football manager Jim Gavin to be its candidate in next month’s presidential election.

news.title: Senan Molony: Why Billy Kelleher’s big result signals end is in sight for Micheál Martin as Fianna Fáil leader
news.summary: This result is more than a blow to Micheál Martin’s prestige and Jim Gavin’s chances.

news.title: Armenia v Ireland, World Cup qualifier: Shambolic Ireland trail in crunch clash
news.summary: Ultán Corcoran brings you all the action from Yerevan in Armenia with kick-off at 5pm Irish time.

news.title: Court grants injunction blocking sale of six valuable horses allegedly taken from equestrian centre by director
news.summary: The High Court has granted an interim injunction restraining the transport or sale of six valuable horses allegedly taken from an equestrian centre by one of its directors.

news.title: ‘I’ll teach them not to see buying a house as the only financial goal’ – nine money experts share the advice they give to their children
news.summary: Manners and general tips for good behaviour are usually high up on the list of life lessons parents want to teach their children.

news.title: The Indo Daily: Missing Donabate boy- “The gardaí are here. I’m telling them everything”
news.summary: How can children go missing in modern-day Ireland?

news.title: How Nuno Espirito Santo’s rift with Edu led to Nottingham Forest downfall
news.summary: It was up in the rolling green hills of Ombria, in the Algarve, when it first became apparent that Nuno Espirito Santo and Nottingham Forest were drifting apart.

news.title: Donald Trump’s ‘bawdy birthday card’ to Jeffrey Epstein is released by Democrats
news.summary: Democrats on the House Oversight Committee have released a sexually suggestive letter to Jeffrey Epstein purportedly signed by US president Donald Trump, which he has denied.

news.title: Katie Taylor and husband pay visit to Wicklow men’s rehabilitation centre
news.summary: World champion boxer Katie Taylor made a rare appearance with her husband last weekend, when the couple visited Tiglin Men’s Centre in Ashford, Co Wicklow.
